titles.title: Retired Military Member Appointments to the Department of Defense Act
To amend title 5, United States Code, to modify the authority to appoint retired members of the armed forces to positions within the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.
Retired Military Member Appointments to the Department of Defense Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Retired Military Member Appointments to the Department of Defense Act
This bill revises restrictions on the appointment of recently retired members of the Armed Forces to civil service positions within the Department of Defense.
